enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve adding listeners for specific message types (indications and requests) on specific local addresses.
Both methods involve adding listeners for indications, with one handling old indications and the other handling general indications.
The handleMessageEvent method must be invoked to process incoming messages, which may include indications that need to be dispatched to the registered listeners.
The fireMessageEvent method is responsible for dispatching incoming messages, including indications, to the appropriate listeners.
